  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1271</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Birkat Hamazon7</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Birkat Hamazon7</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Birkat Hamazon7</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Birkat Hamazon7</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Birkat Hamazon7</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Birkat Hamazon7</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Birkat Hamazon7</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson, learners will examine Birkat Hamazon as an inspiration for caring for the environment. learners will will study sources pertaining to Judaism’s approach to environmental ethics.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Birkat Hamazon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">prayer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lookstein center</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">environmental ethics.</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion überprüfen Anfänger Birkat 
Hamazon als Inspiration für das Interessieren für die Umgebung 
Anfänger willen die Studie Quellen, die Judaism?s Annäherung 
Klimaethik betreffen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon, les étudiants examineront 
Birkat Hamazon comme inspiration pour s'occuper des étudiants 
d'environnement voudront des sources d'étude concernant l'approche de
judaïsme l'éthique environnementale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição, os learners examinarão Birkat 
Hamazon como uma inspiração para importar-se com os learners do 
ambiente quererão as fontes do estudo que pertencem à aproximação 
de Judaism?s ao ethics ambiental.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione, i principianti esamineranno 
Birkat Hamazon come ispirazione per occuparsi dei principianti 
dell'ambiente vorranno le sorgenti di studio che appartengono il 
metodo di Judaism?s l'etica ambientale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα, οι αρχάριοι θα εξετάσουν Birkat 
Hamazon όπως μια έμπνευση για τη φροντίδα για τους αρχαρίους 
περιβάλλοντος θα μελετήσει τις πηγές σχετικά με την προσέγγιση 
Judaism?s στην περιβαλλοντική ηθική.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección, los principiantes examinarán 
Birkat Hamazon como inspiración para cuidar para los principiantes 
del ambiente querrán las fuentes del estudio que pertenecen al 
acercamiento de Judaism?s al ética ambiental.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Birkat Hamazon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gebet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">lookstein Mitte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klimaethik.</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">prière</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">éthique environnementale.</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
